title: Set Up Ad Dayparting
description: An account manager wants to schedule ads to run only during business hours (9 AM - 5 PM, Monday-Friday) to target B2B customers.

tasks.description: Navigate to the ad scheduling settings for the target campaign.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct settings in the ad platform.

tasks.description: Create a custom ad schedule for Monday to Friday, from 9:00 to 17:00.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully inputs the desired schedule.
The campaign is now configured to only run ads during the specified times.
